metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8768 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Jupyter Notebook before 5.4.1, a maliciously forged notebook file can bypass sanitization to execute JavaScript in the notebook context. Specifically, invalid HTML is 'fixed' by jQuery after sanitization, making it dangerous.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8768` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 5.4.1-1
python3-notebook - 5.4.1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ccdm94> ipython does not contain notebook starting on version 4.0.

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
